summary.span: 提供有关当前环境和平台的信息以及操作它们的方法。

span.span: Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment and platform.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来检索信息，如命令行参数，退出代码、 环境变量设置，内容的调用堆栈、 时间自上一次系统启动，并且公共语言运行时的版本。Use the class to retrieve information such as command-line arguments, the exit code, environment variable settings, contents of the call stack, time since last system boot, and the version of the common language runtime. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示有关当前环境的信息的列表。The following example demonstrates displays a list of information about the current environment. [!code-cpp[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/CPP/env0.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/CS/env0.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.class/VB/env0.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取该进程的命令行。

span.span: Gets the command line for this process.

value.span: 包含命令行自变量的字符串。

span.span: A string containing command-line arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供程序名称和当前进程启动时在命令行上指定任何参数的访问。This property provides access to the program name and any arguments specified on the command line when the current process was started. 程序名称可以包含路径信息，但不要求必须这样做。The program name can include path information, but is not required to do so. 使用方法来检索命令行信息分析并存储在一个字符串数组中。Use the method to retrieve the command-line information parsed and stored in an array of strings. 为特定数目的字符; 未设置命令行缓冲区的最大大小它根据计算机运行的 Windows 操作系统而异。The maximum size of the command-line buffer is not set to a specific number of characters; it varies depending on the Windows operating system that is running on the computer. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了其自己的命令行。The following example displays its own command line. [!code-cpp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CPP/commandline.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/CS/commandline.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.commandline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.CommandLine/VB/commandline.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前工作目录的完全限定路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified path of the current working directory.

value.span: 包含目录路径的字符串。

span.span: A string containing a directory path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据定义，如果此过程以在根目录下的本地或网络驱动器，此属性的值是尾部反斜杠后跟的驱动器名称 (例如，"c:\\")。By definition, if this process starts in the root directory of a local or network drive, the value of this property is the drive name followed by a trailing slash (for example, "C:\\"). 如果此过程开始时的子目录中，此属性的值是驱动器和子目录的路径，而无需尾部反斜杠 (例如，"C:\mySubDirectory")。If this process starts in a subdirectory, the value of this property is the drive and subdirectory path, without a trailing slash (for example, "C:\mySubDirectory"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何设置属性。The following example demonstrates setting the property. summary.span: 终止此进程，并将退出代码返回到操作系统。

span.span: Terminates this process and returns an exit code to the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关`exitCode`参数，使用非零数字表示出现错误。For the `exitCode` parameter, use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 在您的应用程序，可以在枚举中定义你自己的错误代码和返回基于方案的相应的错误代码。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，返回值为 1，表示所需的文件不存在，并且值为 2，以指示该文件是格式不正确。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present, and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 使用的 Windows 操作系统的退出代码的列表，请参阅[系统错误代码](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381.aspx)Windows 文档中。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381.aspx) in the Windows documentation. 调用方法不同于使用编程语言的`return`语句按以下方式：Calling the method differs from using your programming language's `return` statement in the following ways: - 始终将终止应用程序。 always terminates an application. 使用`return`语句可能会终止应用程序，仅当它是在中使用的应用程序入口点，例如在`Main`方法。Using the `return` statement may terminate an application only if it is used in the application entry point, such as in the `Main` method. - 应用程序将立即终止，即使其他线程正在运行。 terminates an application immediately, even if other threads are running. 如果`return`中的应用程序入口点调用语句时，会导致应用程序只有在所有前台线程已都终止后终止。If the `return` statement is called in the application entry point, it causes an application to terminate only after all foreground threads have terminated. - 需要调用方有权调用非托管的代码。 requires the caller to have permission to call unmanaged code. `return`语句则不。The `return` statement does not. - 如果从调用`try`或`catch`块中任何代码`finally`块不会执行。If is called from a `try` or `catch` block, the code in any `finally` block does not execute. 如果`return`使用语句中的代码`finally`块会执行。If the `return` statement is used, the code in the `finally` block does execute. - 如果时，将调用中的代码[受约束的执行区域](~/docs/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions.md)(CER) 正在运行，CER 不会完成执行。If is called when code in a [constrained execution region](~/docs/framework/performance/constrained-execution-regions.md) (CER) is running, the CER will not complete execution. 如果`return`使用语句、 CER 完成执行。If the `return` statement is used, the CER completes execution.

summary.span: 获取或设置进程的退出代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code of the process.

value.span: 包含退出代码的 32 位有符号整数。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the exit code.

value.span: 默认值为 0（零），这指示已成功完成处理。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero), which indicates that the process completed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Main`方法将返回`void`，可以使用此属性设置将返回给调用环境的退出代码。If the `Main` method returns `void`, you can use this property to set the exit code that will be returned to the calling environment. 如果`Main`不会返回`void`，将忽略此属性。If `Main` does not return `void`, this property is ignored. 此属性的初始值为零。The initial value of this property is zero. > [!WARNING] > 属性是一个有符号的 32 位整数。The property is a signed 32-bit integer. 若要防止该属性返回退出代码为负，不应使用的值大于或等于 0x80000000。To prevent the property from returning a negative exit code, you should not use values greater than or equal to 0x80000000. 使用一个非零数字表示出现错误。Use a non-zero number to indicate an error. 在您的应用程序，可以在枚举中定义你自己的错误代码和返回基于方案的相应的错误代码。In your application, you can define your own error codes in an enumeration, and return the appropriate error code based on the scenario. 例如，返回值为 1，表示所需的文件不存在和值为 2，以指示该文件是格式不正确。For example, return a value of 1 to indicate that the required file is not present and a value of 2 to indicate that the file is in the wrong format. 使用的 Windows 操作系统的退出代码的列表，请参阅[系统错误代码](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381\(v=vs.85\))Windows 文档中。For a list of exit codes used by the Windows operating system, see [System Error Codes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms681381\(v=vs.85\)) in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 下面是一个简单的应用名为 Double.exe 提高一倍，作为命令行自变量传递给它一个整数值。The following is a simple app named Double.exe that doubles an integer value passed to it as a command-line argument. 值将分配到的错误代码属性以指示错误条件。The value assigns error codes to the property to indicate error conditions. 请注意，必须添加对要成功编译该示例的 System.Numerics.dll 程序集的引用。Note that you must add a reference to the System.Numerics.dll assembly to successfully compile the example. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double.vb#1)] 该示例然后可以从批处理文件，如下所示，让其错误代码可以访问使用调用`ERRORLEVEL`命令。The example can then be invoked from a batch file such as the following, which makes its error codes accessible by using the `ERRORLEVEL` command. ``` echo off Double.exe %1 If errorlevel 1639 goto NoArg if errorlevel 534 goto Overflow if errorlevel 160 goto BadArg if errorlevel 0 echo Completed Successfully goto :EOF :NoArg echo Missing argument goto :EOF : Overflow echo Arithmetic overflow goto :EOF :BadArg echo Invalid argument goto :EOF ``` 下图显示通过调用批处理文件产生的一些示例输出。The following shows some sample output produced by invoking the batch file. ```Output >getdouble 123>echo offResult: 246Completed Successfully>getdouble 5912323109093>echo offArithmetic overflow>getdouble>echo offMissing argument>getdouble "a string">echo offInvalid argument ``` 请注意该代码对 Double.exe 是与以下示例中，函数相同，不同之处在于前者定义名为的入口点`Main`且没有返回值，而此示例定义名为的入口点`Main`返回一个整数。Note that code for Double.exe is identical in function to the following example, except that the former defines an entry point named `Main` that has no return value, whereas this example defines an entry point named `Main` that returns an integer. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/cs/double1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.ExitCode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.exitcode/vb/double1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将嵌入到指定字符串中的每个环境变量的名称替换为该变量的值的等效字符串，然后返回结果字符串。

span.span: Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中的每个环境变量均被替换为该变量的值。

span.span: A string with each environment variable replaced by its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM 互操作用于从操作系统检索环境变量。COM interop is used to retrieve the environment variables from the operating system. 生成一个多个可能的异常; 如果由于 COM 错误而无法检索环境变量，用于说明失败的原因的 HRESULT也就是说，异常取决于相应的 HRESULT。If the environment variables cannot be retrieved due to a COM error, the HRESULT that explains the cause of the failure is used to generate one of several possible exceptions; that is, the exception depends on the HRESULT. 有关如何处理 HRESULT 的详细信息，请参阅备注部分的方法。For more information about how the HRESULT is processed, see the Remarks section of the method. 有关设置环境变量才会被替换。Replacement only occurs for environment variables that are set. 例如，假设`name`是"MyENV = %myenv%"。For example, suppose `name` is "MyENV = %MyENV%". 如果环境变量，MyENV，设置为 42，此方法返回"MyENV = 42"。If the environment variable, MyENV, is set to 42, this method returns "MyENV = 42". 如果未设置 MyENV，不会发生更改;此方法返回"MyENV = %myenv%"。If MyENV is not set, no change occurs; this method returns "MyENV = %MyENV%". 返回值的大小被限制为 32 K。The size of the return value is limited to 32K. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取系统驱动器和系统根变量。The following example shows how to obtain the system drive and system root variables. [!code-cpp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CPP/expandenvironmentvariables.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/CS/expandenvironmentvariables.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.ExpandEnvironmentVariables/VB/expandenvironmentvariables.vb#1)]

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会终止进程，而无需运行任何活动`try` / `finally`块或终结器。This method terminates a process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. 方法写入`message`字符串保存到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中，创建你的应用程序的转储，然后终止当前进程。The method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. `message`字符串也包含在向 Microsoft 报告错误。The `message` string is also included in error reporting to Microsoft. 使用方法而不是方法终止你的应用程序，如果你的应用程序的状态损坏无法修复，并执行应用程序`try` / `finally`块和终结器将损坏程序资源。Use the method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources. 信息是通过使用 Windows 错误报告报告给 Microsoft。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 错误报告： Getting Started](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx). ## Examples 下面的示例日志条目写入 Windows 应用程序事件日志，并终止当前进程。The following example writes a log entry to the Windows Application event log and terminates the current process. [!code-csharp[environment.FailFast#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.FailFast/cs/ff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.FailFast#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.FailFast/vb/ff.vb#1)]

span.span: Immediately terminates a process after writing a message to the Windows Application event log, and then includes the message and exception information in error reporting to Microsoft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会终止进程，而无需运行任何活动`try` / `finally`块或终结器。This method terminates the process without running any active `try`/`finally` blocks or finalizers. 方法写入`message`字符串保存到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中，创建你的应用程序的转储，然后终止当前进程。The method writes the `message` string to the Windows Application event log, creates a dump of your application, and then terminates the current process. 信息是通过使用 Windows 错误报告报告给 Microsoft。Information is reported to Microsoft by using Windows Error Reporting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 错误报告： Getting Started](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx)。For more information, see [Windows Error Reporting: Getting Started](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/hardware/dn641144.aspx). 向 Microsoft 报告的错误包括`message`和`exception`提供了用于对错误分类的详细信息的信息。Error reporting to Microsoft includes `message` and `exception` information, which provides details used to classify the error. 尽管`exception`是未处理，因为该进程将终止，仍获取引发该异常的上下文信息。Although `exception` is not handled because the process is terminated, the contextual information that raised the exception is still obtained. 如果`exception`是`null`，或者如果`exception`是不会引发，此方法的操作与相同方法重载。If `exception` is `null`, or if `exception` is not thrown, this method operates the same as the method overload. 使用方法而不是方法终止你的应用程序，如果你的应用程序的状态损坏无法修复，并执行应用程序`try` / `finally`块和终结器将损坏程序资源。Use the method instead of the method to terminate your application if the state of your application is damaged beyond repair, and executing your application's `try`/`finally` blocks and finalizers will corrupt program resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的第一个元素包含正在执行的程序的文件名。The first element in the array contains the file name of the executing program. 未提供的文件的名称时，第一个元素是等于。If the file name is not available, the first element is equal to . 剩余的元素包含在命令行中输入的任何其他令牌。The remaining elements contain any additional tokens entered on the command line. 程序文件名称可以但不是需要，包含路径信息。The program file name can, but is not required to, include path information. 由空格分隔的命令行参数。Command line arguments are delimited by spaces. 两个双引号 （"） 可用于参数中包含空格。You can use double quotation marks (") to include spaces within an argument. 单引号 （'），但是，不提供此功能。The single quotation mark ('), however, does not provide this functionality. 如果两个或偶数个反斜杠后跟双引号，继续下一步的每个反斜杠对将被替换为一个反斜杠，并且删除双引号。If a double quotation mark follows two or an even number of backslashes, each proceeding backslash pair is replaced with one backslash and the double quotation mark is removed. 如果双引号匹配后跟反斜杠，其中包括只是一个为奇数使用一个反斜杠替换为每个前面对并删除剩余的反斜杠;但是，在这种情况下双引号不会删除。If a double quotation mark follows an odd number of backslashes, including just one, each preceding pair is replaced with one backslash and the remaining backslash is removed; however, in this case the double quotation mark is not removed. 下表演示了如何命令行参数可以是分隔，并假定`MyApp`作为当前正在执行应用程序。The following table shows how command line arguments can be delimited, and assumes `MyApp` as the current executing application. |在命令行输入Input at the command line|生成命令行参数Resulting command line arguments| |-------------------------------|--------------------------------------| |`MyApp alpha beta`|`MyApp, alpha, beta`| |`MyApp "alpha with spaces" "beta with spaces"`|`MyApp, alpha with spaces, beta with spaces`| |`MyApp 'alpha with spaces' beta`|`MyApp, 'alpha, with, spaces', beta`| |`MyApp \\\alpha \\\\"beta`|`MyApp, \\\alpha, \\beta`| |`MyApp \\\\\"alpha \"beta`|`MyApp, \\"alpha, "beta`| 若要获取作为单个字符串的命令行，请使用属性。To obtain the command line as a single string, use the property. ## Examples 以下示例显示应用程序的命令行参数。The following example displays the application's command line arguments. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CPP/getcommandlineargs.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/CS/getcommandlineargs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetCommandLineArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetCommandLineArgs/VB/getcommandlineargs.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从当前进程的环境块检索环境变量。The method retrieves an environment variable from the environment block of the current process only. 它相当于调用方法替换`target`的值。It is equivalent to calling the method with a `target` value of . 若要检索所有环境变量以及它们的值，请调用方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 环境变量名称区分大小写 Linux 和 macOS 上，但在 Windows 上不区分大小写。Environment variable names are case-sensitive on Linux and macOS but are not case-sensitive on Windows. ### 在 Windows 系统上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系统上当前进程的环境块包括：On Windows systems, the environment block of the current process includes: - 由创建它的父进程提供给它的所有环境变量。All environment variables that are provided to it by the parent process that created it. 例如，从控制台窗口启动.NET 应用程序继承了所有控制台窗口的环境变量。For example, a .NET application launched from a console window inherits all of the console window's environment variables. 如果没有父进程，而使用每台计算机和每个用户环境变量。If there is no parent process, per-machine and per-user environment variables are used instead. 例如，新的控制台窗口具有它启动时定义的所有每台计算机和每个用户的环境变量。For example, a new console window has all per-machine and per-user environment variables defined at the time it was launched. - 当进程运行时通过调用添加到 process 块的任何变量方法或方法替换`target`的值。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 在.NET 应用程序终止之前，将始终保留这些环境变量。These environment variables persist until the .NET application terminates. 如果进程启动后创建了环境变量，可以使用此方法来检索已通过调用创建的变量方法或方法替换`target`的值。。If environment variables are created after the process has started, you can use this method to retrieve only those variables that were created by calling the method or the method with a `target` value of .. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux 上，当前进程的环境块包括以下环境变量：On macOS and Linux, the environment block of the current proccess includes the following environment variables: - 由创建它的父进程提供给它的所有环境变量。All environment variables that are provided to it by the parent process that created it. 对于从 shell 启动.NET 应用程序，这包括在外壳程序中定义的所有环境变量。For .NET applications launched from a shell, this includes all environment variables defined in the shell. - 当进程运行时通过调用添加到 process 块的任何变量方法或方法替换`target`的值。Any variables added to the process block while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 在.NET 应用程序终止之前，将始终保留这些环境变量。These environment variables persist until the .NET application terminates. 在 macOS 上.NET core 和 Linux 不支持每台计算机或每个用户环境变量。.NET Core on macOS and Linux does not support per-machine or per-user environment variables. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来检索`windir`环境变量，其中包含 Windows 目录的路径。The following example uses the method to retrieve the `windir` environment variable, which contains the path of the Windows directory. [!code-cpp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CPP/Vars1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/CS/Vars1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Environment#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Environment/VB/Vars1.vb#4)] 下面的示例尝试检索名为环境变量的值`Test1`从进程环境块。The following example attempts to retrieve the value of an environment variable named `Test1` from the process environment block. 如果不存在该变量，该示例将创建它，并检索其值。If the variable doesn't exist, the example creates its and retrieves its value. 此示例显示变量的值。The example displays the value of the variable. 如果该示例创建变量，它还会调用方法的每个成员与枚举，以建立可以仅从当前进程环境块检索到该变量。If the example created the variable, it also calls the method with each member of the enumeration to establish that the variable can be retrieved only from the current process environment block. 最后，如果该示例创建变量，会将其删除。Finally, if the example created the variable, it deletes it. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/cs/getenvironmentvariableex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.getenvironmentvariable/vb/getenvironmentvariableex1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要检索所有环境变量以及它们的值，请调用方法。To retrieve all environment variables along with their values, call the method. 环境变量名称区分大小写 Linux 和 macOS 上，但在 Windows 上不区分大小写。Environment variable names are case-sensitive on Linux and macOS but are not case-sensitive on Windows. ### 在 Windows 系统上On Windows systems 在 Windows，`target`参数指定是否从当前进程或当前用户或本地计算机的 Windows 操作系统注册表项检索环境变量。On Windows, the `target` parameter specifies whether the environment variable is retrieved from the current process or from the Windows operating system registry key for the current user or local machine. 以及任何其他可用于创建.NET 进程的父进程的环境变量，每个用户和每台计算机的所有环境变量会自动都复制到当前进程的环境块。All per-user and per-machine environment variables are automatically copied into the environment block of the current process, as are any other environment variables that are available to the parent process that created the .NET process. 但是，环境变量添加到当前进程的环境块仅通过调用方法或方法替换`target`的值仅过程的持续期间保留。However, environment variables added only to the environment block of the current process by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of persist only for the duration of the process. ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上On macOS and Linux systems 在 macOS 和 Linux 上`GetEnvironmentVariable(String, EnvironmentVariableTarget)`方法支持`target`的值仅。On macOS and Linux, the `GetEnvironmentVariable(String, EnvironmentVariableTarget)` method supports a `target` value of only. 使用调用`target`的值或不受支持，并返回`null`。Calls with a `target` value of or are not supported and return `null`. 每个进程环境变量为：Per-process environment variables are: - 这些继承自父进程，通常用于调用的 shell`dotnet.exe`或启动.NET 应用程序。Those inherited from the parent process, typically the shell used to invoke `dotnet.exe` or to launch the .NET application. - 通过调用定义的那些方法或方法替换`target`的值。Those defined by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . 这些环境变量保留仅直到`dotnet`进程或.NET 应用程序终止。These environment variables persist only until the `dotnet` process or the .NET application terminates. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的过程、 用户和计算机的目标的环境变量，检查是否操作系统注册表包含用户和计算机的环境变量，然后删除的环境变量。The following example creates environment variables for the Process, User, and Machine targets, checks whether the operating system registry contains the User and Machine environment variables, then deletes the environment variables. remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和环境变量的值存储在返回的键 / 值对为。The names and values for the environment variables are stored as key-value pairs in the returned . ### 在 Windows 系统上On Windows systems 在 Windows 系统上`GetEnvironmentVariables`方法将返回以下环境变量：On Windows systems, the `GetEnvironmentVariables` method returns the following environment variabless: - 所有每台计算机创建的进程，以及它们的值时定义的环境变量。All per-machine environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 该过程将创建时定义的所有每用户环境变量，以及它们的值。All per-user environment variables that are defined at the time the process is created, along with their values. - 继承自父进程从中启动或进程运行时添加到 process 块的.NET 应用程序的任何变量。Any variables inherited from the parent process from which the .NET application was launched or added to the process block while the process is running. 当进程运行时通过调用添加环境变量方法或方法替换`target`的值。Environment variables are added while the process is running by calling either the method or the method with a `target` value of . ### 在 macOS 和 Linux 系统上On macOS and Linux systems 在 MacOS 和 Linux 上`GetEnvironmentVariables`方法检索的名称和值的继承自父进程启动的所有环境变量`dotnet`范围内定义过程或`dotnet`流程自身。On MacOS and Linux, the `GetEnvironmentVariables` method retrieves the name and value of all environment variables that are inherited from the parent process that launched the `dotnet` process or that are defined within the scope of the `dotnet` process itself. 一次`dotnet`进程结束，这些后一种环境变量停止存在。Once the `dotnet` process ends, these latter environment variables cease to exist. .NET core 不支持每台计算机或每个用户环境变量。.NET Core does not support per-machine or per-user environment variables. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索系统特殊文件夹，如 Program Files、 程序、 系统或启动时，可用来访问公共信息的路径。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 特殊文件夹时设置的默认系统，或由用户显式安装的 Windows 版本。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`参数指定要检索的特殊文件夹，并且必须为中的值之一枚举; 任何其他值将引发异常。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅[CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664)值主题。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来返回并显示与关联的路径`folder`参数。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return and display the path associated with the `folder` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索系统特殊文件夹，如 Program Files、 程序、 系统或启动时，可用来访问公共信息的路径。This method retrieves the path to a system special folder, such as Program Files, Programs, System, or Startup, which can be used to access common information. 特殊文件夹时设置的默认系统，或由用户显式安装的 Windows 版本。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. `folder`参数指定要检索的特殊文件夹，并且必须为中的值之一枚举; 任何其他值将引发异常。The `folder` parameter designates the special folder to retrieve and must be one of the values in the enumeration; any other value throws an exception. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅[CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664)值主题。For more information about special folders, see the [CSIDL](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=116664) values topic.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前的应用程序域是否正在卸载或者公共语言运行时 (CLR) 是否正在关闭。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain is being unloaded or the common language runtime (CLR) is shutting down.

value.span: 如果当前的应用程序域正在卸载或者 CLR 正在关闭，为 ；否则，为

span.span: if the current application domain is being unloaded or the CLR is shutting down; otherwise,

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 卸载应用程序域，它具有终结器方法，该应用程序域中的所有对象上运行终结器。When the CLR unloads an application domain, it runs the finalizers on all objects that have a finalizer method in that application domain. CLR 关闭时，它具有终结器方法的所有对象上启动终结器线程。When the CLR shuts down, it starts the finalizer thread on all objects that have a finalizer method. 属性返回`true`仅启动终结器线程后。The property returns `true` only after the finalizer thread has been started. 如果此属性返回`true`，可以确定是否正在卸载应用程序域或 CLR 本身正在通过调用关闭方法。When the property returns `true`, you can determine whether an application domain is being unloaded or the CLR itself is shutting down by calling the method. 此方法返回`true`如果称为终结器，因为应用程序域正在卸载或`false`如果 CLR 正在关闭。This method returns `true` if finalizers are called because the application domain is unloading or `false` if the CLR is shutting down. 属性返回`false`终结器线程未启动。The property returns `false` if the finalizer thread has not been started. 通过使用此属性，可以确定是否要访问终止代码中的静态变量。By using this property, you can determine whether to access static variables in your finalization code. 如果应用程序域或 CLR 正在关闭，您不能可靠地访问具有完成方法并且由静态字段引用的任何对象。If either an application domain or the CLR is shutting down, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and that is referenced by a static field. 这是因为这些对象可能被终结。This is because these objects may have already been finalized.

span.span: Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法相当于调用值为重载为`target`参数。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the overload with a value of for the `target` argument. 如果`value`参数不为空 （请参阅删除环境变量在本部分中的空值的定义更高版本的讨论） 和命名的环境变量`variable`参数不存在，环境创建变量并将其分配的内容`value`。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` parameter does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果文件确实存在，将修改其值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 由于在当前进程的环境块中定义的环境变量，不会保留在过程结束后。Because the environment variable is defined in the environment block of the current process only, it does not persist after the process has ended. 如果`variable`包含非初始十六进制零字符的零个字符将被视为环境变量名称，并将忽略所有后续字符之前的字符。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`包含非初始十六进制零字符的零个字符分配给环境变量并将忽略所有后续字符之前的字符。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`为空，命名的环境变量`variable`存在，则删除该环境变量。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. 如果`variable`不存在，会发生任何错误即使无法执行该操作。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs even though the operation cannot be performed. `value` 被视为任何以下情况下为空：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是`null`。It is `null`. - 它是。It is . - 它包含单个字符，其值为 U + 0000。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. ## Examples 下面的示例测试是否名为的环境变量`APPDOMAIN`当前进程中存在。The following example tests whether an environment variable named `APPDOMAIN` exists in the current process. 如果不是，它将创建它并将其设置为"True"。If it does not, it creates it and sets its value to "True". 如果的值`APPDOMAIN`环境变量为"True"时，它调用`Message.Display`中新的应用程序域的方法。If the value of the `APPDOMAIN` environment variable is "True", it calls the `Message.Display` method in a new application domain. 否则，它将执行`Message.Display`当前应用程序域中的方法。Otherwise, it executes the `Message.Display` method in the current application domain. summary.span: 创建、修改或删除当前进程中或者为当前用户或本地计算机保留的 Windows 操作系统注册表项中存储的环境变量。

span.span: Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process or in the Windows operating system registry key reserved for the current user or local machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可让你定义适用于当前进程的环境变量 (值)。The method lets you define an environment variable that is available to the current process (the value). 仅在进程结束前，持久保存所独有的当前进程环境块的环境变量。Environment variables that are unique to the current process environment block persist only until the process ends. 此外，在仅，Windows 系统上方法允许您定义是可用于的计算机运行的所有进程的环境变量 (值) 和由用户运行的所有进程 (值)。In addition, on Windows systems only, the method lets you define an environment variable that is available to all processes that run on a machine (the value) and to all processes run by a user (the value). 每台计算机和每个用户环境变量会复制到当前进程的环境块。Per-machine and per-user environment variables are copied into the environment block of the current process. MaxOS 和 Linux 系统上的.NET Core 上, 调用具有值的方法或将被忽略。On .NET Core on maxOS and Linux systems, calls to the method with a value of or are ignored. 如果`value`参数不为空 （请参阅删除环境变量在本部分中的空值的定义更高版本的讨论） 和命名的环境变量`variable`参数不存在，环境创建变量并将其分配的内容`value`。If the `value` argument is not empty (see the discussion of deleting an environment variable later in this section for the definition of an empty value) and the environment variable named by the `variable` argument does not exist, the environment variable is created and assigned the contents of `value`. 如果文件确实存在，将修改其值。If it does exist, its value is modified. 如果`variable`包含非初始十六进制零字符的零个字符将被视为环境变量名称，并将忽略所有后续字符之前的字符。If `variable` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are considered the environment variable name and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`包含非初始十六进制零字符的零个字符分配给环境变量并将忽略所有后续字符之前的字符。If `value` contains a non-initial hexadecimal zero character, the characters before the zero character are assigned to the environment variable and all subsequent characters are ignored. 如果`value`为空，命名的环境变量`variable`存在，则删除该环境变量。If `value` is empty and the environment variable named by `variable` exists, the environment variable is deleted. `value` 被视为任何以下情况下为空：`value` is considered empty under any of the following conditions: - 它是`null`。It is `null`. - 它是。It is . - 它包含单个字符，其值为 U + 0000。It consists of a single character whose value is U+0000. 如果`variable`不存在，不会出现错误但无法执行该操作。If `variable` does not exist, no error occurs although the operation cannot be performed. 要小心`target`是，因为意外删除会影响整个本地计算机，而不仅仅是当前进程或用户的环境变量。Be careful when `target` is , because you can accidentally delete an environment variable that affects your entire local machine, not just the current process or user. ### EnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine 和 Windows 系统上的 EnvironmentVariableTarget.UserEnvironmentVariableTarget.Machine and EnvironmentVariableTarget.User on Windows systems 如果`target`是，环境变量存储在本地计算机的注册表 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment 项中。If `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它也会复制到的文件资源管理器以当前用户身份运行的实例。It is also copied to instances of File Explorer that are running as the current user. 然后在用户从文件资源管理器启动任何新进程继承该环境变量。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that the user launches from File Explorer. 同样，如果`target`是，环境变量存储在本地计算机的注册表的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment 密钥。Similarly, if `target` is , the environment variable is stored in the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment key of the local computer's registry. 它也会复制到文件资源管理器的所有实例。It is also copied to all instances of File Explorer. 然后从文件资源管理器启动任何新进程继承该环境变量。The environment variable is then inherited by any new processes that are launched from File Explorer. 如果`target`是或，其他应用程序将通过 Windows 通知设置操作的`WM_SETTINGCHANGE`消息。If `target` is or , other applications are notified of the set operation by a Windows `WM_SETTINGCHANGE` message. 如果`target`是或，我们建议的长度`value`小于 2048年个字符。If `target` is or , remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性列表中按时间顺序逆序方法调用、 即，首先，描述最新的方法调用和每个方法调用堆栈上列出的堆栈跟踪信息的一行。The property lists method calls in reverse chronological order, that is, the most recent method call is described first, and one line of stack trace information is listed for each method call on the stack. 但是，属性可能不报告任意多个方法调用按预期由于优化期间发生代码转换。However, the property might not report as many method calls as expected due to code transformations that occur during optimization. > [!NOTE] > 由类的堆栈跟踪信息的层次结构视图，使用类。For a hierarchical view of the stack trace information by class, use the class. 属性设置为每个方法调用的堆栈跟踪信息的格式，如下所示：The property formats the stack trace information for each method call as follows: "在`FullClassName`。`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) 中`FileName`： 行`LineNumber`""at `FullClassName`.`MethodName`(`MethodParams`) in `FileName` :line `LineNumber` " "At"文本前面的三个空格，并且如果调试符号不可用，则省略"in"以开始将整个子字符串。The literal "at" is preceded by three spaces, and the entire substring starting with "in" is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 将占位符`FullClassName`， `MethodName`， `MethodParams`， `FileName`，和`LineNumber`、 将替换为实际值和定义，如下所示：The placeholders, `FullClassName`, `MethodName`, `MethodParams`, `FileName`, and `LineNumber`, are replaced by actual values, and are defined as follows: FullClassNameFullClassName 类，包括命名空间的完整名称。The full name of the class, including the namespace. `MethodName` 方法的名称。The name of the method. `MethodParams` 参数类型/名称对的列表。The list of parameter type/name pairs. 每个对用逗号分隔 （"，"）。Each pair is separated by a comma (","). 如果省略此信息`MethodName`不带任何参数。This information is omitted if `MethodName` takes no parameters. `FileName` 文件的源的名称，其中`MethodName`方法声明。The name of the source file where the `MethodName` method is declared. 如果调试符号不可用，则省略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. `LineNumber` 中的行数`FileName`，其中包含从源代码`MethodName`是调用堆栈上的指令。The number of the line in `FileName` that contains the source code from `MethodName` for the instruction that is on the call stack. 如果调试符号不可用，则省略此信息。This information is omitted if debug symbols are not available. 字符串终止的堆栈跟踪的每个行。The string terminates each line of the stack trace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property. summary.span: 获取系统启动后经过的毫秒数。

span.span: Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started.

value.span: 一个 32 位带符号整数，它包含自上次启动计算机以来所经过的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the amount of time in milliseconds that has passed since the last time the computer was started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值派生自系统计时器，并存储为 32 位有符号整数。The value of this property is derived from the system timer and is stored as a 32-bit signed integer. 注意，因为它派生自系统计时器的分辨率属性仅限于系统计时器，它通常在 10 到 16 毫秒为单位的范围的解决方法。Note that, because it is derived from the system timer, the resolution of the property is limited to the resolution of the system timer, which is typically in the range of 10 to 16 milliseconds. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为的值属性值是 32 位带符号的整数，如果系统连续，运行从零到将递增大约 24.9 天，然后跳转到，这是负号，然后递增到下一步 24.9 几天的零。Because the value of the property value is a 32-bit signed integer, if the system runs continuously, will increment from zero to for approximately 24.9 days, then jump to , which is a negative number, then increment back to zero during the next 24.9 days. 可以通过调用 Windows 来解决此问题[GetTickCount](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724408.aspx)函数，它将重置为零大约 49.7 天，或通过调用[GetTickCount64](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724411.aspx)函数。You can work around this issue by calling the Windows [GetTickCount](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724408.aspx) function, which resets to zero after approximately 49.7 days, or by calling the [GetTickCount64](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724411.aspx) function. 不同于属性，它是 0001 年 1 月 1 日，12:00 am 起经过的 100 纳秒间隔数。 is different from the property, which is the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 1/1/0001, 12:00am. 使用属性来获取当前本地日期和时间在此计算机上的。Use the property to obtain the current local date and time on this computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索返回值的正值范围属性。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the positive range of values returned by the property. 属性之间循环，这是负数，和49.8 天一次。The property cycles between , which is a negative number, and once every 49.8 days. 此代码示例会删除符号位，以生成一个非负数字，周期介于零和24.9 天。This code sample removes the sign bit to yield a nonnegative number that cycles between zero and once every 24.9 days. [!code-cpp[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CPP/tickcount.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/CS/tickcount.cs#1)] [!code-vb[environment.tickcount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.TickCount/VB/tickcount.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来标识系统和应用程序安全性或访问时，在当前线程上的用户。You can use the property to identify the user on the current thread, to the system and application for security or access purposes. 它还可以用于自定义每个用户的特定应用程序。It can also be used to customize a particular application for each user. 在 Windows 上属性包装了对 Windows 的调用[GetUserName](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724432.aspx)函数。On Windows the property wraps a call to the Windows [GetUserName](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724432.aspx) function. 用户的域帐户凭据的格式为用户的域名称\\字符和用户名。The domain account credentials for a user are formatted as the user's domain name, the '\\' character, and user name. 使用属性来获取用户的域名和属性来获取用户名称。Use the property to obtain the user's domain name and the property to obtain the user name. 在 Unix 平台上属性包装调用`getpwuid_r`函数。On Unix platforms the property wraps a call to the `getpwuid_r` function. 如果 ASP.NET 应用程序在开发环境中，运行属性返回当前用户的名称。If an ASP.NET application runs in a development environment, the property returns the name of the current user. 在已发布的 ASP.NET 应用程序中，此属性返回 （例如默认应用程序池） 的应用程序池帐户的名称。In a published ASP.NET application, this property returns the name of the application pool account (such as Default AppPool). ## Examples 下面的示例显示启动当前线程的人员的用户名。The following example displays the user name of the person who started the current thread.
